ourTeamText: Our team of experts is comprised of professionals who are passionate about their work, and have an extensive background in a wide variety of applications, and are willing to help at any time
PartnersDescription: At Landa Holding, we welcome strategic affiliations with international firms and qualified influencers alike. As an approved affiliate, you will receive co-branded support and future representations that wield substantial influence within the business landscape. To become an affiliate, please complete our free questionnaire for our confidential review.

cards.title: Investment
cards.text: At Landa Investment Center, we typically focus on investing in innovative, scalable startups with international market potential and the valuation of up to $5 million. We are a group of angel investors who can help you build your team, define your business model, and increase the value of your startup in global markets. With initial investment, capital raising, and access to a network of global investors, we will assist you in achieving success and increasing your business development.

cards.title: Acceleration
cards.text: At Landa Acceleration Center, entrepreneurs are provided with a dynamic and nurturing environment designed to foster creativity and collaboration. The acceleration center boasts useful facilities, cutting-edge resources, experienced mentors, and professional experts, which will all help individuals to accelerate their own businesses and expand their new creative startups. Landa Holding understand that the challenges startups face. Therefore, we offer comprehensive programs that address business development, and market expansion.

cards.title: Academy
cards.text: At Landa Academy, we provide individuals with a nurturing place to discover and grow their interests and skills efficiently. Our academy operates as a dynamic place that identifies and evaluates the potential of talented individuals, particularly youth, and invests in their development and creative ideas. By providing comprehensive programs and resources and through a combination of mentoring, skill-building workshops, and exposure to various opportunities, Landa Academy equips participants with the tools and knowledge necessary to thrive and succeed in their chosen fields.

logos.title: Islamic Azad University of Isfahan(Khorasgan)
logos.description: Since 1396, at the same time as Farazman was established, we have been working with Isfahan Azad University in the field of student investment and acceleration.

logos.title: Dr. Nekui Educational Holding
logos.description: We are proud to cooperate with the educational holding of Dr. Nekui Academy of Business and Investment in the field of youth startups and we are moving forward for a bright future of youth startups and ideas.

commentsData.name: Morteza Jafari
commentsData.commentDescription: The specialized and skilled staff at Landa Holding made short work on the issues that had been preventing me from advancing in my career.

commentsData.name: Jane Doe
commentsData.commentDescription: For me, my time spent working with Landa Holdings with this extremely competent staff was an experience that I will never forget.

commentsData.name: Bob Smith
commentsData.commentDescription: Landa Holding is home to a youthful and inventive workforce that is brimming with enthusiasm for all they do.
